column5: Can anyone reccomend me someone or somewhere I can have my older 54 Pro Series looked at without getting hosed on $?  It just stopped working and did some voltage tests and seems like all the wiring up top is good, but I can't seem to get the prop moving.  Thanks in advance.  Mark
Boat Tec in Pickering services both Motor Guide and Minn Kota motors.  http://www.smartanglers.com/main/node/7097
Aikmens is excellent and will give you an honest price.
Can't go wrong. this is the place I always end up when i need parts and fair pricing.
Went to Aikman's on Tuesday.  2 days later I have it back!  Time to put it to use tomorrrow.  Big thumbs up to Aikman's for a very reasonable and quick repair!  Thanks for the advice!
